markdownRemark.html: Situated in Seville. Co-ed day (3-18 years). English National Curriculum education, n conjunction with obligatory elements of the Spanish curriculum. They study a wide range of subjects from the British curriculum and, in addition, Spanish language and humanities.

frontmatter.title: St George's British School - Seville

English National Curriculum education, n conjunction with obligatory elements of the Spanish curriculum. They study a wide range of subjects from the British curriculum and, in addition, Spanish language and humanities.
